name: Krazy Kiwi Story
description:
My fan remake of Taito Corporations 1988 game The New Zealand Story/Kiwi Kraze.

I am not affiliated with Taito Corporation.  This is a non-profit fan made video game.

I have made stage 1.  I am still undecided whether or not to do more stages.

I coded the game in JavaScript and I used the Phaser3 framework.
